meanings.sent1: The candle was flickering in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The campfire was flickering in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The flickering flame danced like a tiny fairy.
meanings.sent4: Her flickering smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The flickering light cast eerie shadows on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The butterfly was flickering from flower to flower.
meanings.sent2: The hummingbird was flickering around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The flickering squirrel darted up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were flickering with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The flickering leaves danced in the wind.

meanings.definition: A brief burst of light or flame
meanings.sent1: I saw a flickering in the distance, like a shooting star.
meanings.sent2: The flickering of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The flickering of the birthday candles made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The flickering of the lanterns created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The flickering of the bonfire warmed our faces.
